src:
Staggering scale of zero hour contracts across UK exposed - find out how your area rates
Our investigation reveals the grim daily reality of life working in the gig economy, the subject of Ken Loach's new film 'Sorry We Missed You'
01 Nov 2019, 00:01 by Richard Innes, https://www.mirror.co.uk/authors/richard-innes/
